headline: Is Norfolk Southern’s 24% 2025 Rally Still Supported by Fundamentals?
summary: If you have been wondering whether Norfolk Southern is still a buy after its big run, you are not alone. The stock now sits near $291.60 and investors are asking if the current price fairly reflects its long term value. Even with a recent 2.6% slip over the last week, the stock is still up 1.9% over the past month and 24.3% year to date, with a 26.3% gain over the past year that keeps it firmly on many watchlists. Recent headlines have focused on operational improvements, ongoing safety...
